Item ID10470

The Saradomin stole is part of the Saradomin vestment set. To wear one, the player needs at least 60 Prayer.

It will count as a Saradominist item within the God Wars Dungeon.

 Attack bonuses
+0+0+0+2+0
 Defence bonuses

Tier Emotes STASH Location Items Cost
Hard Beckon North-east corner of the Kharazi Jungle 42,356[c 1]
  1. ↑ The cost may be higher because of the variant of the item used. The base item is stole.

[[File:Saradomin stole detail.png|left|90px]]
The '''Saradomin stole''' is part of the [[Saradomin vestment set]]. To wear one, the player needs at least 60 [[Prayer]].

It will count as a Saradominist item within the [[God Wars Dungeon]].
